summary: Lightning is a powerful natural event that happens when electricity moves between clouds or from clouds to the ground. It releases a huge amount of energy and can create light and heat. There are different types of lightning, like inside a cloud or between clouds. People have been fascinated by lightning for a long time, and it can even be seen in old photographs. Lightning is important because it can affect the air and even start fires, which might change the climate. Scientists are still learning about how lightning works and its impact on our world.
title: Lightning
